attributes.action: Allow every english person to have English on their passports
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are english. I think we should Have our own Identity shown on our passports. Along with the scottish people and Welsh. 
Britain is a good thing and should not break up the union. However we hav a GB team in the Olimpics and a England team in the world cup. Make England its own country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
